mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_pw = PASSWORD(#{memberPw}) WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_email = #{memberEmail}

mapper.select: SELECT member_id memberId, member_name memberName, member_addr memberAddr, member_phone memberPhone, member_email memberEmail, member_date memberDate, member_pic memberPic FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_id FROM ( SELECT member_id FROM member UNION SELECT member_id FROM memberid) t WHERE member_id = #{memberIdCheck}
SELECT member_id memberId, member_pw memberPw FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_pw = PASSWORD(#{memberPw})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_addr, member_date, member_pic ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, PASSWORD(#{memberPw}), #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAddr}, NOW(), #{memberPic} )
